entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests crashing on linux-arm64 #102140
  • `NullReferenceException` with bulk memory copy helper on win-x86 #102138
    9.0.0
  • PropertyDescriptor.AddValueChanged is not thread-safe #102136
  • LockFreeReaderHashtable growing algorithm results in an arithmetic overflow #102131
  • Invariant.Tests.dll test failure on wasm #102128
  • [API Proposal] Round-trip `PackagePart.CompressionOption`, add `CompressionLevel.Fast` #102127
  • Merge inherited interface methods according to variance #102121

Closed

  • JIT: Unify `InlinedCallFrame` secret stub arg handling #100662
    Future
  • JsonNumberEnumConverter writes string property names #102120
  • error CS9176: There is no target type for the collection expression #102130
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 5/3/2024 3:54:35 PM #102044
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move unicodedata to minipal #102139
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle GT_CNS_LNG and GT_CNS_DBL in GenTree::Compare #102137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Reorder stores to make them amenable to stp optimization #102133
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SIMD for block inits with GC fields #102132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 124.0.6367.201, windows: 124.0.6367.201 #102119
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Move checked math helpers to C# #102129
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix build break in outer loop tests #102134
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable tests failing on NAOT #102065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build break in outer loop runtime tests #102115
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64: avoid memory barrier in InlinedMemmoveGCRefsHelper if dest is not on heap #102084
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TimeSpanConverter: Less restrict in-range check to allow more timespan formats that would be accepted by Utf8Parser.TryParse #102091
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Change the ReciprocalEstimate and ReciprocalSqrtEstimate APIs to be mustExpand on RyuJIT #102098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • TypeDescriptor-related trimming supportType descriptor #102094
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Unify `GT_JMP` handling in the backends #102117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Unpin arm build image, use Debian 12 helix images #102059
    needs-area-label

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Issue]: Generic Type Specialization Not Working in C# #8115

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interface-Method: IsSealed does not work as expected #73441
  • `System.InsufficientExecutionStackException` thrown in `LocalBinderFactory` compiling `ErrorFacts.IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic()` on MacOS #73439
  • Possibly unintended reuse of `ref` local to `in`/`ref readonly` parameters causes unexpected mutation #73438

PullRequests

Created

  • Port tests of "Invert if" refactoring to `VerifyCS/VB` #73440
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Make placement of raw string guide line independent of the space chars used #73435
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, plaintext #55681
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #55679
  • Exception triggered by AuthorizeAttribute on the first page loaded in a circuit #55678

Closed

  • Perf regression: endpoint, json, plaintext #55675
  • Project created by dotnet new blazor -int WebAssembly -ai cannot be deployed to a static web site #55658
  • Perf improvement: caching, json, mapaction #55667
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mapaction, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #55670

PullRequests

Created

  • Add .NET 9 nightly NuGet feed and remove .NET 7 #55680
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting entry text from binding before user interaction sets null on iOS #22357
  • Grid height "*" not working inside of nested collection views in iOS #22356
  • [Windows] Cannot run `StyleTests.StyleClassAreCorrecltyMerged` unit test in Visual Studio #22355
  • [macOS] CollectionView.Header with a Grid - incorrect fixed width - does not resize #22354
  • MS build pair to mac optimization #22352
  • Blazor Layout breaks/clips on the right side on iPad after resuming from the background #22349

Closed

  • 'Microsoft.Maui.Platform.LayoutView' does not have a constructor that takes one NativeHandle argument #22150

PullRequests

Created

  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    community ✨
  • [iOS] FlyoutPage Shadow works incorrectly on iOS - fix #22351
    community ✨
  • Fix Android multi-window error message notation #22350
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Android] InputTransparent="true" on a Layout breaks child controls - Fix #22345
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Improve performance of `ContentPanel.EnsureBorderPath` #22346
    platform/windows 🪟, area-perf, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.MissingMethodException: Constructor on type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.Internal.NullableClassCurrentProviderValueComparer [again] #33704
  • Reparenting an entity marks it as Deleted by Change Tracker #33703

PullRequests

Updated

  • Translate to NULLIF #32710
    blocked
  • Fixes #20604 - Treat ToString as casting to string in the database #33701
